competition_summary.context: Competition The equipment operations sell products and services into a variety of highly competitive global and regional markets. The principal competitive factors in all markets include product performance, innovation and quality, distribution, customer service, and price. In North America and many other parts of the world, John Deere’s brand recognition is a competitive factor. The agricultural equipment industry continues to undergo significant changes and is becoming even more competitive th
